release_notes.en-US:
Added multi-language support
Added a feature to remove single entries from local cache
Added a tooltip that shows album info in "Edited tracks" popup window
Added a feature to swap artist and track name before submitting track info
Added Chinese translation
Added Polish translation
Added Russian translation
Added 1ting connector
Added Douban Artists connector
Added FIP Radio connector
Added JetSetRadio Live connector
Added Kugou connector
Added RemixRotation connector
Added SiriusXM connector
Added WFMU connector
Improve 163 Music connector
Improved Baidu connector
Improved BeMusic connector
Improved Douban connector
Improved Kuwo connector
Improved QQ Music connector
Improved Xiami connector
Improved Youtube metadata filter
Removed DashRadio connector
Removed support for old Pandora website
Replaced Nova Planet with Radio Nova
Updated popup and options UI
Updated Libre.fm API key and API secret
Fixed an issue when the cover art image wasn't be opened in new tab
Fixed a regression when track duration wasn't updated properly
Fixed a regression when the extension sent data to GA even it was turned off by user
Fixed Gaana connector

Disabled loading info from Libre.fm
Added timeouts for all network requests
Fixed applying wrong page action icon
Fixed Youtube options

Added support for Libre.fm
Added a notification a now playing song is ignored by scrobbling service
Added a feature to open the extension page on first installation
Added a feature to show changelog for major/notable updates
Added Kodi connector
Applied album info from Last.fm/Libre.fm if album title is empty
Changed behaviour of scrobbling multiple artists
Improved (re)authentication process
Improved feature to save edited song data
Made reauthentication working on-the-fly
Added ability to clear the list of edited songs
Added Patari connector
Added S2 Music support
Added Taazi connector
Improved Plex connector
Removed "Use autocorrect" option
Removed Chorus connector
Removed Hydricmedia connector
Removed Noonpacific connector
Removed Trntbl connector
Removed Wrzuta connector
Fixed Bandcamp connector
Fixed Digitally Imported connector
Fixed Mixcloud connector
Fixed Pinguin Radio connector
Fixed TuneIn connector
Fixed a regression when the extension didn't apply custom URL patterns
Fixed an issue when Opera didn't displayed icons in notifications
